name: 19115-4 WG MDB
description:
## Refactoring to use standard building blocks

Working draft of 19115-4 JSON encoding.

Examples provided by WG - schema generated by Shapechange ?
annotatedSchema:
$comment: JSON Schema document created by ShapeChange - https://shapechange.net/
$schema: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
$id: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/-4/mdb/1.0/mdb.json
$defs:
  missing:
    type: string
    description: missing ref in schema
  Abstract_Constraint:
    $anchor: Abstract_Constraint
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  Abstract_DistributionUnion:
    $anchor: Abstract_DistributionUnion
    $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Distribution'
  Abstract_Extent:
    $anchor: Abstract_Extent
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  Abstract_FormatUnion:
    $anchor: Abstract_FormatUnion
    $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Format'
  Abstract_LineageInformationUnion:
    $anchor: Abstract_LineageInformationUnion
    $ref: '#/$defs/LI_Lineage'
  Abstract_Maintenance:
    $anchor: Abstract_Maintenance
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  Abstract_Metadata:
    $anchor: Abstract_Metadata
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  Abstract_MetadataExtension:
    $anchor: Abstract_MetadataExtension
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  Abstract_ResourceDescriptionUnion:
    $anchor: Abstract_ResourceDescriptionUnion
    $ref: '#/$defs/MD_DataIdentification'
  Abstract_StandardOrderProcess:
    $anchor: Abstract_StandardOrderProcess
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  CI_Address:
    $anchor: CI_Address
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          deliveryPoint:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          city:
            type: string
          administrativeArea:
            type: string
          postalCode:
            type: string
          country:
            type: string
          electronicMailAddress:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  CI_Citation:
    $anchor: CI_Citation
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          title:
            type: string
          alternateTitle:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          date:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Date'
            uniqueItems: true
          edition:
            type: string
          editionDate:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          identifier:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
            uniqueItems: true
          citedResponsibleParty:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
            uniqueItems: true
          presentationForm:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_PresentationFormCode'
            uniqueItems: true
          series:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Series'
          otherCitationDetails:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          ISBN:
            type: string
          ISSN:
            type: string
          onlineResource:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_OnlineResource'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
        - title
    required:
    - properties
  CI_Contact:
    $anchor: CI_Contact
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          phone:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Telephone'
            uniqueItems: true
          address:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Address'
            uniqueItems: true
          onlineResource:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_OnlineResource'
            uniqueItems: true
          hoursOfService:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          contactInstructions:
            type: string
          contactType:
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  CI_Date:
    $anchor: CI_Date
    type: object
    properties:
      date:
        type: string
        format: date-time
      dateType:
        $ref: '#/$defs/CI_DateTypeCode'
    required:
    - date
    - dateType
  CI_DateTypeCode:
    $anchor: CI_DateTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  CI_Individual:
    $anchor: CI_Individual
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          name:
            type: string
          contactInfo:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Contact'
            uniqueItems: true
          partyIdentifier:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
            uniqueItems: true
          positionName:
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  CI_OnLineFunctionCode:
    $anchor: CI_OnLineFunctionCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  CI_OnlineResource:
    $anchor: CI_OnlineResource
    type: object
    properties:
      linkage:
        type: string
      protocol:
        type: string
      applicationProfile:
        type: string
      name:
        type: string
      description:
        type: string
      function:
        $ref: '#/$defs/CI_OnLineFunctionCode'
      protocolRequest:
        type: string
    required:
    - linkage
  CI_Organisation:
    $anchor: CI_Organisation
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          name:
            type: string
          contactInfo:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Contact'
            uniqueItems: true
          partyIdentifier:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
            uniqueItems: true
          individual:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Individual'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  CI_PartyUnion:
    $anchor: CI_PartyUnion
    oneOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Individual'
    - $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Organisation'
  CI_PresentationFormCode:
    $anchor: CI_PresentationFormCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  CI_Responsibility:
    $anchor: CI_Responsibility
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          party-CI_Individual:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Individual'
            uniqueItems: true
          party-CI_Organisation:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Organisation'
            uniqueItems: true
          role:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_RoleCode'
          extent:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/EX_Extent'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
        - role
    required:
    - properties
  CI_RoleCode:
    $anchor: CI_RoleCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  CI_Series:
    $anchor: CI_Series
    type: object
    properties:
      name:
        type: string
      issueIdentification:
        type: string
      page:
        type: string
  CI_Telephone:
    $anchor: CI_Telephone
    type: object
    properties:
      number:
        type: string
      numberType:
        $ref: '#/$defs/CI_TelephoneTypeCode'
    required:
    - number
  CI_TelephoneTypeCode:
    $anchor: CI_TelephoneTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  CountryCode:
    $anchor: CountryCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  DCPList:
    $anchor: DCPList
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  DS_AssociationTypeCode:
    $anchor: DS_AssociationTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  DS_InitiativeTypeCode:
    $anchor: DS_InitiativeTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  EX_Extent:
    $anchor: EX_Extent
    allOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/Abstract_Extent'
    - type: object
      properties:
        geographicElement-EX_GeographicBoundingBox:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            format: uri-reference
          uniqueItems: true
        geographicElement-EX_GeographicDescription:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            format: uri-reference
          uniqueItems: true
        description:
          type: string
  EX_GeographicBoundingBox:
    $anchor: EX_GeographicBoundingBox
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          extentTypeCode:
            type: boolean
            default: false
          westBoundLongitude:
            type: number
          eastBoundLongitude:
            type: number
          southBoundLatitude:
            type: number
          northBoundLatitude:
            type: number
        required:
        - '@type'
        - eastBoundLongitude
        - northBoundLatitude
        - southBoundLatitude
        - westBoundLongitude
    required:
    - properties
  EX_GeographicDescription:
    $anchor: EX_GeographicDescription
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          extentTypeCode:
            type: boolean
            default: false
          geographicIdentifier:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
        required:
        - '@type'
        - geographicIdentifier
    required:
    - properties
  EX_GeographicExtentUnion:
    $anchor: EX_GeographicExtentUnion
    oneOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/EX_GeographicBoundingBox'
    - $ref: '#/$defs/EX_GeographicDescription'
  KeywordTypeCode-Bio:
    $anchor: KeywordTypeCode-Bio
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  LI_Lineage:
    $anchor: LI_Lineage
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          source:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/LI_Source'
            uniqueItems: true
          statement:
            type: string
          scope:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Scope'
          additionalDocumentation:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  LI_Source:
    $anchor: LI_Source
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          description:
            type: string
          sourceReferenceSystem:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_ReferenceSystem'
          sourceCitation:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
          sourceMetadata:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
            uniqueItems: true
          scope:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Scope'
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  LanguageCode:
    $anchor: LanguageCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_CellGeometryCode:
    $anchor: MD_CellGeometryCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_CharacterSetCode:
    $anchor: MD_CharacterSetCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_ClassificationCode:
    $anchor: MD_ClassificationCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_Constraints:
    $anchor: MD_Constraints
    allOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/Abstract_Constraint'
    - type: object
      properties:
        properties:
          type: object
          properties:
            useLimitation:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
              uniqueItems: true
            constraintApplicationScope:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Scope'
            reference:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
              uniqueItems: true
            responsibleParty:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
              uniqueItems: true
  MD_CoverageContentTypeCode:
    $anchor: MD_CoverageContentTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_DataIdentification:
    $anchor: MD_DataIdentification
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          citation:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
          abstract:
            type: string
          purpose:
            type: string
          credit:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          status:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_ProgressCode'
            uniqueItems: true
          pointOfContact:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
            uniqueItems: true
          spatialRepresentationType:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_SpatialRepresentationTypeCode'
            uniqueItems: true
          temporalResolution:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              format: duration
            uniqueItems: true
          topicCategory:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_TopicCategoryCode'
            uniqueItems: true
          extent:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/EX_Extent'
            uniqueItems: true
          additionalDocumentation:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
            uniqueItems: true
          processingLevel:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
          theTaxonomySystem:
            type: string
            format: uri-reference
          resourceConstraints-MD_Constraints:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Constraints'
            uniqueItems: true
          resourceConstraints-MD_LegalConstraints:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_LegalConstraints'
            uniqueItems: true
          resourceConstraints-MD_SecurityConstraints:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_SecurityConstraints'
            uniqueItems: true
          resourceFormat:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Format'
            uniqueItems: true
          descriptiveKeywords:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Keywords'
            uniqueItems: true
          resourceMaintenance:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_MaintenanceInformation'
            uniqueItems: true
          resourceSpecificUsage:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              format: uri-reference
            uniqueItems: true
          defaultLocale:
            $ref: '#/$defs/PT_Locale'
          otherLocale:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/PT_Locale'
            uniqueItems: true
          environmentDescription:
            type: string
          supplementalInformation:
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
        - abstract
        - citation
    required:
    - properties
  MD_DatatypeCode:
    $anchor: MD_DatatypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_DigitalTransferOptions:
    $anchor: MD_DigitalTransferOptions
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          unitsOfDistribution:
            type: string
          transferSize:
            type: number
          onLine:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_OnlineResource'
            uniqueItems: true
          offLine:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Medium'
            uniqueItems: true
          transferFrequency: {}
          distributionFormat:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Format'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  MD_DimensionNameTypeCode:
    $anchor: MD_DimensionNameTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_Distribution:
    $anchor: MD_Distribution
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          distributor:
            type: array
            items:
              oneOf:
              - type: string
                format: uri-reference
              - $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Distributor'
            uniqueItems: true
          transferOptions:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_DigitalTransferOptions'
            uniqueItems: true
          distributionFormat:
            type: array
            items:
              oneOf:
              - type: string
                format: uri-reference
              - $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Format'
            uniqueItems: true
          description:
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  MD_Distributor:
    $anchor: MD_Distributor
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          distributionFormat-MD_Format:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              format: uri-reference
            uniqueItems: true
          distributorTransferOptions:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_DigitalTransferOptions'
            uniqueItems: true
          distributorContact:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
        required:
        - '@type'
        - distributorContact
    required:
    - properties
  MD_Format:
    $anchor: MD_Format
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          formatDistributor:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Distributor'
            uniqueItems: true
          formatSpecificationCitation:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
          amendmentNumber:
            type: string
          fileDecompressionTechnique:
            type: string
          medium:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Medium'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
        - formatSpecificationCitation
    required:
    - properties
  MD_GeometricObjectTypeCode:
    $anchor: MD_GeometricObjectTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_IdentificationUnion:
    $anchor: MD_IdentificationUnion
    $ref: '#/$defs/MD_DataIdentification'
  MD_Identifier:
    $anchor: MD_Identifier
    type: object
    properties:
      authority:
        $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
      code:
        type: string
      codeSpace:
        type: string
      version:
        type: string
      description:
        type: string
    required:
    - code
  MD_ImagingConditionCode:
    $anchor: MD_ImagingConditionCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_KeywordTypeCode:
    $anchor: MD_KeywordTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_Keywords:
    $anchor: MD_Keywords
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          keyword:
            type: array
            minItems: 1
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          type:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_KeywordTypeCode'
          thesaurusName:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
        required:
        - '@type'
        - keyword
    required:
    - properties
  MD_LegalConstraints:
    $anchor: MD_LegalConstraints
    allOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Constraints'
    - type: object
      properties:
        properties:
          type: object
          properties:
            accessConstraints:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/MD_RestrictionCode'
              uniqueItems: true
            useConstraints:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/MD_RestrictionCode'
              uniqueItems: true
            otherConstraints:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
              uniqueItems: true
  MD_MaintenanceFrequencyCode:
    $anchor: MD_MaintenanceFrequencyCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_MaintenanceInformation:
    $anchor: MD_MaintenanceInformation
    allOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/Abstract_Maintenance'
    - type: object
      properties:
        properties:
          type: object
          properties:
            maintenanceAndUpdateFrequency:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_MaintenanceFrequencyCode'
            maintenanceDate:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Date'
              uniqueItems: true
            userDefinedMaintenanceFrequency: {}
            maintenanceScope:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Scope'
              uniqueItems: true
            maintenanceNote:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
              uniqueItems: true
            contact:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
              uniqueItems: true
  MD_Medium:
    $anchor: MD_Medium
    type: object
    properties:
      name:
        $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
      density:
        type: integer
      densityUnits:
        type: string
      volumes:
        type: integer
      mediumFormat:
        type: array
        items:
          $ref: '#/$defs/MD_MediumFormatCode'
        uniqueItems: true
      mediumNote:
        type: string
      identifier:
        $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
  MD_MediumFormatCode:
    $anchor: MD_MediumFormatCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_Metadata:
    $anchor: MD_Metadata
    allOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/Abstract_Metadata'
    - type: object
      properties:
        properties:
          type: object
          properties:
            metadataConstraints:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Constraints'
              uniqueItems: true
            resourceLineage:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/LI_Lineage'
              uniqueItems: true
            distributionInfo:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Distribution'
              uniqueItems: true
            identificationInfo-MD_DataIdentification:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/MD_DataIdentification'
              uniqueItems: true
            metadataMaintenance:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_MaintenanceInformation'
            metadataScope:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
                format: uri-reference
              uniqueItems: true
            dataQualityInfo:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: https://ogcincubator.github.io/iso19115-json/build/annotated/metacat/iso19115/dqc/schema.yaml#/$defs/DataQuality
              uniqueItems: true
            metadataIdentifier:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
            defaultLocale:
              $ref: '#/$defs/PT_Locale'
            parentMetadata:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
            contact:
              type: array
              minItems: 1
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
              uniqueItems: true
            dateInfo:
              type: array
              minItems: 1
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Date'
              uniqueItems: true
            metadataStandard:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
              uniqueItems: true
            metadataProfile:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
              uniqueItems: true
            alternativeMetadataReference:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
              uniqueItems: true
            otherLocale:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/PT_Locale'
              uniqueItems: true
            metadataLinkage:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/$defs/CI_OnlineResource'
              uniqueItems: true
          required:
          - contact
          - dateInfo
      required:
      - properties
  MD_MetadataScope:
    $anchor: MD_MetadataScope
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          resourceScope:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_ScopeCode'
          name:
            type: string
        required:
        - '@type'
        - resourceScope
    required:
    - properties
  MD_ObligationCode:
    $anchor: MD_ObligationCode
    type: string
    enum:
    - mandatory
    - optional
    - conditional
  MD_ProgressCode:
    $anchor: MD_ProgressCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_ReferenceSystem:
    $anchor: MD_ReferenceSystem
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          referenceSystemIdentifier:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Identifier'
          crs: {}
          coordinateEpoch: {}
          referenceSystemType:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_ReferenceSystemTypeCode'
        required:
        - '@type'
    required:
    - properties
  MD_ReferenceSystemTypeCode:
    $anchor: MD_ReferenceSystemTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_RepresentativeFraction:
    $anchor: MD_RepresentativeFraction
    type: object
    properties:
      denominator:
        type: integer
    required:
    - denominator
  MD_RestrictionCode:
    $anchor: MD_RestrictionCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_Scope:
    $anchor: MD_Scope
    type: object
    properties:
      level:
        $ref: '#/$defs/MD_ScopeCode'
      extent:
        type: array
        items:
          $ref: '#/$defs/EX_Extent'
        uniqueItems: true
      levelDescription:
        type: array
        items:
          $ref: '#/$defs/MD_ScopeDescription'
        uniqueItems: true
    required:
    - level
  MD_ScopeCode:
    $anchor: MD_ScopeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_ScopeDescription:
    $anchor: MD_ScopeDescription
    type: string
  MD_SecurityConstraints:
    $anchor: MD_SecurityConstraints
    allOf:
    - $ref: '#/$defs/MD_Constraints'
    - type: object
      properties:
        properties:
          type: object
          properties:
            classification:
              $ref: '#/$defs/MD_ClassificationCode'
            userNote:
              type: string
            classificationSystem:
              type: string
            handlingDescription:
              type: string
          required:
          - classification
      required:
      - properties
  MD_SpatialRepresentationTypeCode:
    $anchor: MD_SpatialRepresentationTypeCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_TopicCategoryCode:
    $anchor: MD_TopicCategoryCode
    type: string
    enum:
    - farming
    - biota
    - boundaries
    - climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere
    - economy
    - elevation
    - environment
    - geoscientificInformation
    - health
    - imageryBaseMapsEarthCover
    - intelligenceMilitary
    - inlandWaters
    - location
    - oceans
    - planningCadastre
    - society
    - structure
    - transportation
    - utilitiesCommunication
    - extraTerrestrial
    - disaster
  MD_TopologyLevelCode:
    $anchor: MD_TopologyLevelCode
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  MD_Usage:
    $anchor: MD_Usage
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          specificUsage:
            type: string
          usageDateTime:
            type: array
            uniqueItems: true
          userDeterminedLimitations:
            type: string
          userContactInfo:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
            uniqueItems: true
          response:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          additionalDocumentation:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
            uniqueItems: true
          identifiedIssues:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
        required:
        - '@type'
        - specificUsage
    required:
    - properties
  PT_Locale:
    $anchor: PT_Locale
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          language:
            $ref: '#/$defs/LanguageCode'
          country:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CountryCode'
          characterEncoding:
            $ref: '#/$defs/MD_CharacterSetCode'
        required:
        - '@type'
        - characterEncoding
        - language
    required:
    - properties
  SV_CouplingType:
    $anchor: SV_CouplingType
    $ref: '#/$defs/missing'
  SV_ParameterDirection:
    $anchor: SV_ParameterDirection
    type: string
    enum:
    - in
    - out
    - in/out
  TaxonomicClassification:
    $anchor: TaxonomicClassification
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          commonName:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
            uniqueItems: true
          taxonRankName:
            type: string
          taxonRankValue:
            type: string
          hierarchialClass:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/TaxonomicClassification'
            uniqueItems: true
        required:
        - '@type'
        - taxonRankName
        - taxonRankValue
    required:
    - properties
  TaxonomySystem:
    $anchor: TaxonomySystem
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          classificationSystemAuthority:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
          classificationSystemModifications:
            type: string
          generalTaxonomicScope:
            type: string
          identificationReference:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Citation'
          observer:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
            uniqueItems: true
          identificationTaxonomicProcedures:
            type: string
          identificationTaxonomicCompleteness:
            type: string
          theVouchers:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              format: uri-reference
            uniqueItems: true
          theTaxonomicClassification:
            type: string
            format: uri-reference
        required:
        - '@type'
        - classificationSystemAuthority
        - identificationReference
        - identificationTaxonomicProcedures
        - theTaxonomicClassification
    required:
    - properties
  Vouchers:
    $anchor: Vouchers
    type: object
    properties:
      properties:
        type: object
        properties:
          '@type':
            type: string
          specimen:
            type: string
          repository:
            $ref: '#/$defs/CI_Responsibility'
        required:
        - '@type'
        - repository
        - specimen
    required:
    - properties
